wikipedia_page.main: Timothy Adès (born 1941) is an English poet and translator.

response: Adès was born in London to art historian Dawn Adès and poet Timothy Adès. His surname is of Syrian Jewish origin.
* Winner: Timothy Adès for Homer in Cuernavaca by Alfonso Reyes (Edinburgh University Press)
In 1966, the then Dawn Tylden-Pattenson married the British poet and translator Timothy Adès. Together they have three sons, one of whom is the composer, pianist and conductor Thomas Adès.
